body_html: @scotthuang1989 Most of the time you have several layers. tf.keras.Model helps you to compose these layers. For example tf.keras.Sequential is a subclass of tf.keras.Model. So, I think you should really build your neural net using tf.keras.Model c.f https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/keras#model_subclassing

body: @scotthuang1989 Most of the time you have several layers. tf.keras.Model helps you to compose these layers. For example tf.keras.Sequential is a subclass of tf.keras.Model. So, I think you should really build your neural net using tf.keras.Model c.f  https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/keras#model_subclassing
